page.title: 11LANDSCAPE
page.content: The area in question is rural with many farms and open country side.The farms grow crops the most well known being the Cheshire potato.The emblem of{Cheshire}is the wheatsheaf because of its farming connections.There are dairy,poultry,farms and stables throughout the whole area.The main attraction around {Kingsley and Manley is {Delamere }Forest.The Forest was planted by the Normans.The Normans were devoted to sport so for hunting they planted a Forest.This they called the Forest of{Mara and Mondrem}it covered the whole of what is called the{Eddisbury hundred.}This Forest is know called{Delamere Forest.}Also well known is{Hatchmere Lake}which is now used by Lymm angling club and is popular in Summer.
